column2: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] approaches you with a request: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I want your permission to travel to the Pagan lands and spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith among those unfortunate people. It shall be for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].'

My [Root.GetLordLady],

I would like us to invest in building a great temple for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I will contribute from my own purse to the construction costs.

Ever in service of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
Strange news reach your ears. Apparently, one of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!
It seems another of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!

A number of incriminating letters have been found. They are from your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], addressed to various members of your court, praising the simple virtues of the [Root.job_spiritual.Location.Religion.GetName]s and contrasting them with the tired, decadent ways of the [Root.Religion.GetName]s. This surely explains the recent outbreak of vile flirting with heathenry at your court!

Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledNameWithNick], has been discovered charging money for various religious favors, putting the gold in [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] own pocket.

My [Root.GetTitle],
I find life here among the heathens both wretched and dangerous, and I am convinced that they are both blind and deaf to the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I plead with you to allow me to return home where I can do more useful work for the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Your loyal servant,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
Your zeal does you credit. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be with you.
A great idea!
Why on earth...?
Something strange is going on here...
The Pagan-loving traitor!
Intolerable!
Very well, I will recall [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim].
Very well, if you insist.
It would be a waste of money.
If this madness stops now, I shall forgive.
Disappointing, but understandable.
The whining coward will be of no use there anyway.
No, I will not allow it.
[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] must stay and do [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] duty.
